DOC.brief_title: A Registry Evaluate Patterns Care Associated With Use Corus速 CAD Real World Clinical Care Settings
DOC.detailed_description: Though diagnostic property Corus速 CAD evaluate previous observational study , limited data regard primary care clinician use result test care management patient angina . This registry design examine relationship Corus CAD score pattern care regard diagnostic test real world clinical care setting . Atherosclerotic coronary artery disease ( CAD ) common cause morbidity mortality worldwide . CAD affect 16.5 million person US . Diagnosing CAD straightforward pose enormous burden health care system . The common symptom CAD chest pain ( angina ) , however , 10 % -30 % chest pain related symptom due CAD . Though several diagnostic test CAD ( e.g. , coronary angiography , stress testing , nuclear myocardial perfusion imaging ( MPI ) ) , limitation , include invasiveness , safety risk ( e.g. , bleeding , radiation exposure ) , expense , lack accuracy , subjectivity evaluation interpretation finding , lack availability geographic region . Recent scientific finding demonstrate multiple gene activate circulate blood cell patient CAD . A gene expression test detects activate and/or deactivate gene could therefore serve tool aid diagnosis CAD . The Corus速 CAD test ( henceforth , `` Corus CAD '' ) validate quantitative vitro diagnostic test , perform single Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments ( CLIA ) laboratory CardioDx , Inc. , use gene expression level 23 gene peripheral blood specimen assess likelihood subject least 50 % coronary artery stenosis . Corus CAD incorporate expression level gene , use validate algorithm weighted function , generate quantitative score indicate use stable patient typical atypical symptom suggestive CAD ( e.g. , chest pain , shortness breath , heartburn , fatigue exertion ) . The test non-invasive ( involve simple venipuncture ) , result evaluate one laboratory , minimal potential variability analysis finding .
